title: Characterization of carbapenemase-producing Enterobacterales from rectal swabs of patients in the intensive care units of a tertiary hospital in Cali-Colombia
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Mónica Fernandes-Pineda, Ernesto Martínez-Buitrago, José H. Bravo, Lorena Matta-Cortés, Johann A. Ospina-Galindez, Claudia C. Paredes-Amaya
